name: Osers BetaJam Shooter
description:
Simple Top-Down single room shooter, built for ludum dare, but never submitted.

This is my first ever game jam, and the first game i've made from scratch without any tutorials or assistance. All artwork is 100% original, created in Pixly on my nvidia shield tablet before being imported into GM:S2

Unzip, run game, survive...

GMS2 project files included
